appStages.name: Introduction
Claims Recommendations

{
  "components": [

      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eClaims Recommendation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload multiple insurance claim forms. Each of these forms will be processed and analyzed. Hit \u0027Analyze\u0027 to begin the analysis process.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",

      "input": false,

    },
